title: Bananas in pyjamas birthday special
brief_description: The bananas, B1 and B2 and the teddies Amy, Lulu and Morgan have lots of fun together and they get up to lots of mischief as well. “Cuddles Avenue” - the naughty bananas decide to play a trick on the teddies. “Birthday Week” - it’s the bananas’ birthday on Friday and the excitement builds as the teddies prepare a surprise party. “Wet Paint” - Amy and Morgan can’t resist touching the brand new paint of the park bench, just to see if it is really wet. “Fancy Dress” - the bananas and teddies have been invited to a fancy dress party.
